body.name: Tieplis Non Stick Frying Pans, 8 inch Nonstick Egg Omelet Skillet with 3-Layer Non-stick Coating, Non-Toxic, Dishwasher＆Oven Safe, Compatible with All Cooktops (Gas, Electric & Induction)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Non-stick Frying Pans】- Frying pan diameter 8 inch, base diameter 6.1 inch, perfect for slide-off-the-pan eggs, sauteing veggies, flipping pancakes and more.

【Non-toxic Nonstick Coating】- 3-layer non-stick black coating on the interior, high temperature resistant black coating on the exterior. Made with only food-safe materials, 100% free of PFOA, PTFE, PFAS, lead and cadmium, ideal for use with a small amount of oil or butter for healthy eating.

【Premium Material】- Made of hard forged aluminum, 4.5mm thickness edge, the internal structure is fine and uniform, has strong rigidity, is not easily deformed, has the characteristics of long-lasting use, corrosion resistance and good thermal conductivity.
【Ergonomic Solid Handle】Sandblasted forged stainless steel handles are ergonomically designed for comfort and double-riveted for strength and maneuverability, providing maximum comfort for cooking.

【Safe ＆ Easy to Use】Dishwasher ＆ oven safe, oven safe up to 500°F, 3.8mm thickness hole induction bottom is designed to prevent hot spots and to enable quick, even heat distribution, compatible with gas, electric, glass ceramic, and induction stoves.
【Perfect Customer Care Service】If you encounter any problems about the product, please contact us through Amazon, we will provide solutions within 24 hours until the customer is satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan. I had bought the 12 in. pan and needed the 10 in. pan. They both are great, quality, heavy duty, doesn't stick, and super easy to clean. Follow the instructions and you should have no problems. I recommend this to a lot of friends and families.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Sturdy Culinary Essential for Every Kitchen
reviews.reviewText: The Tieplis Non Stick Frying Pan has become an indispensable tool in my kitchen, providing unparalleled sturdiness and exceptional quality that have significantly elevated my cooking experience. The 10-inch skillet's robust construction has impressed me with its durability, making it a reliable option for daily culinary endeavors.The 3-layer non-stick coating has proven to be highly effective, allowing for effortless food release and easy cleanup, even after preparing delicate dishes. Its non-toxic composition has provided me with peace of mind, ensuring that my cooking remains safe and healthy for my family.The pan's compatibility with all cooktops, including gas, electric, and induction, has made it an incredibly versatile addition to my kitchen, allowing for seamless transitions between different cooking methods without any hassle. Its dishwasher and oven-safe features have further simplified the cleaning and cooking processes, saving me valuable time and effort.Overall, the Tieplis Non Stick Frying Pan has surpassed my expectations with its sturdy build and exceptional non-stick performance. It has quickly become my go-to pan for a wide range of recipes, making cooking a delightful and hassle-free experience. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable, well-made frying pan that delivers excellent cooking results every time. Highly recommended for its quality and versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than described!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantasic, non-stick pan!I don't know WHY the review asks if this is lightweight because well-made chef's pans should be heavy to distribute heat and prevent burning. This pan is NOT lightweight. It's heavy enough to distribute heat well. I've cooked eggs, carbonara, and sauteed in it, with no burning! It wipes clean. So far, no scratches or dings; it's holding up well.The sides of the pan are straight, not rounded, so it will not work well for crepes or omelets.I wish I had this pan in several sizes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good non stick pan
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a good pan. It’s not my favorite pan but it’s good. It has a decent weight to it, not too heavy and not too light. The non stick is great. In my pic I have potatoes, onions, shrimp and cheese and didn’t use any butter. Nothing stuck to the pan. My meal slid right into the dish. Also, the heat distribution is quite uniform which is nice. The only reason I took off 1 star is because of the handle. It’s a solid handle which doesn’t heat up. I just wish it felt a bit more rounded in my hand.Oh, last but not least, this washed up great on the bottom rack of the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive frying pan
reviews.reviewText: This frying pan has quickly become my go-to pan for most things I cook. I haven’t had it very long, but I have cooked a variety of foods in it already, and I am impressed with the pan. The food cooks uniformly….Even if I’m using a small burner, it doesn’t have hot spots like some pans. It really is non-stick and requires only a small amount of butter or oil for cooking. I have done stir fry, fried pork chops, gravy, omelette, pancakes, hash browns, and more. It seems to need a little higher heat on my stove, and a little more preheating time, which hasn’t caused any smoking or burning from butter or oil, like with some pans. The handle is aluminum, but doesn’t get too hot. The size is great for me, and the depth is good. I like that it can be used in the oven too. I didn’t find any instructions with it, but it doesn’t seem to need anything special. It’s supposed to be dishwasher safe, but I wash my pans by hand, and this one is very very easy to clean. I’m very satisfied with this pan and am sure it will be used a lot. It was a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Essential Tieplis Frying Pan: A Kitchen Must-Have
reviews.reviewText: The Tieplis Frying Pan quickly became the go-to pan in my kitchen. It’s impressively heavy and well-balanced, which I appreciate. Cleaning is remarkably easy by hand or it’s dishwasher-safe, a relief considering how frequently I use it – practically every evening and some mornings. The non-stick feature is excellent, making cooking and clean-up hassle-free. While it lacks a lid, its versatility and quality still earn it a solid 5-star rating in my book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice small non-stick fry pan
reviews.reviewText: The pan comes nicely packed in an easy to wrap box, so I think gift idea when I come across such packaging. But that's not what we are here to talk about.The pan has a nice flat bottom with a bit of an angle bevel where it slopes up the sides. This flat bottom works great for sausages or steaks where you might want to put a meat weight on. Generally those are around 8 inches, so they will fit the pan perfectly to get sensational sears.The handle is attached with rivets and is secure in place. It rises slightly and has a wrap under which makes for a comfortable feel in my hand. I did not notice the handle becoming hot while cooking.For me, I like smaller frying pans like this for eggs, more specifically omelets. They are the perfect size.I use gas stove primarily and also have a standard electric cooktop which sits countertop and I can move it around. I do not have an induction cooktop so I can't attest to how it performs for that. For gas and conventional electric the pan performs as expected.The non stick surface didn't need any seasoning or pre treatment use. I do use oils and butters to cook and for their thermal transmission qualities, but I was able to use them sparingly with this pan and have excellent release results.
